name: Simple Soup Game
description:
My entry for the GAMES MADE QUICK??? FOUR+ game jam.

Make some nice soup to make people happy! You can use up to 3 ingredients, and you will have 3 servings to distribute to customers with specific tastes. How high can you score in 7 days?

Click and drag ingredients into the slots and click on slots to clear them, you don't need to use all 3 slots. When you are ready, click Serve to choose which customers would be happiest with your soup.

Assets:
Use Your Head - Sockpuppet
Free Pixel Food by Henry Software
TopDown Interior Home Tileset by BTLgames
Castle Platformer Tileset by RottingPixels
